description.value:
As an owlin, you have certain traits in common with your people.

Age. Owlin reach maturity by age 3. Short-lived compared to humans, owlin don't usually live longer than 30 years.

Size. You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you select this race.

Speed. Your walking speed is 30 feet.

Creature Type. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.f4JiPsoK1CMOkGxU]{Creature Type} You are a Humanoid.

Flight. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.BkngoWTDpQbRwwj9]{Flight} Thanks to your wings, you have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. You can't use this flying speed if you're wearing armor, or if you're encumbered.

Silent Feathers. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.IrzZeChIYLYJy23n]{Silent Feathers} While you aren't wearing armor, you have advantage on Stealth checks made to remain silent.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
